channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: GDP report shows U.S. economy slowing. But it’s better than it might look.
Trump files formal notice of plan to appeal hush money conviction
item.description: President Donald Trump's lawyers formally notified a New York state court of Trump's intent to appeal his criminal conviction.

item.title: Chemicals giant Dow to cut 1,500 jobs
Trump says he will send migrants to Guantanamo Bay
item.description: Trump, since taking office last week, has taken numerous actions to crack down on illegal U.S. border crossings and deport undocumented migrants.

item.title: How Apple became the stock everyone loves to hate — and whether you should, too
Aviation stocks in focus after deadly crash at Washington National
First-time claims for unemployment benefits drop sharply
Trump accuses Fed, Powell of creating inflation on heels of rate decision
item.description: Trump, who appointed Jerome Powell as Fed chair, has called for lower interest rates and said the president should get a say on the Fed's rate decisio...

item.title: Trump lashes out at Biden, DEI efforts after D.C. plane crash
item.description: President Donald Trump blasted former President Joe Biden and Democratic diversity measures after a midair collision above Washington, D.C.

item.title: White House says Trump funding freeze remains in effect despite rescinding OMB memo
item.description: The OMB memo had directed federal agencies to pause grants and loans pending a review of compliance with the agenda of President Donald Trump.
